Articles.Content: Hi there just got the game yesterday. just flying a ship atm its my third rocket and its currently at around 3780K and decelarting. its currently at 1779ms an the decelaration is very very slow...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
THANKIES! the rocket is still going... its now at 6580k and traveling at 1596.3ms. its loosing arounf .1 ms every ten seconds...I don think my boys are coming home,,,

LOL If I had a dollar for every Kerbal I've doomed to a freeze dried existence, I'd be rich!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

I believe you have reached what is known as escape velocity. You will decelerate but never reach zero. Technically, 0 m/s would be reached at an infinite distance! You should check out the projects and releases forum for more parts too, becuase the stock parts become boring after a while...

Try to orbit the planet sometime too! http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/index.php?title=Tutorial:Orbiting_(Basic)
Even so. I call it a success!third rocket hits escape velocity! fourth! will orbit!
